title: GG Riot Ve1vet, jynx, toast, and Vitzkrieg!!!
body:
Today was my first time playing in a long time and first game was against you guys. Couldn't ask for anything better! 

P.S. Riot Toast's Cass is OP! So much pain, much wow!

replies.body: Thank you for the game!~ Welcome back! =)

Jynx, could you pass this thread along to your forums/bug report team? Quote is copyasta from my screen, plus bold.

> Riot Jynx (NA)
> - **a day ago**

>Thank you for the game!~ Welcome back! =)
>
>    Reply
>    Permalink
>
>Report
>
>
>Sir ArmaMalum (NA)
> - **about a month ago**

>I was watching those games, they were very good. Hope everyone else had fun as well!
>
>    Reply
>    Permalink
>
>Report
I was watching those games, they were very good. Hope everyone else had fun as well!
